dialogueLines.line: Listen, have you seen Boyfriend around recently?
dialogueLines.speaker: dad

dialogueLines.line: Yep, I have. He was here just a minute ago.
dialogueLines.speaker: pico

dialogueLines.line: Not so fast. If you want insider information, you gotta pay up.
dialogueLines.speaker: pico

dialogueLines.line: I'm not giving you a single dime after you failed to accomplish the last task I commissioned you.
dialogueLines.speaker: dad

dialogueLines.line: How about I offer a different deal instead?
dialogueLines.speaker: dad
